eu.wauz.wauzcore.players

Class CharacterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.CharacterManager

  • public class CharacterManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The character manager is used to login/out characters and manage their data.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • loginCharacter

        public static void loginCharacter(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                  WauzMode wauzMode)
        Logs in the character specified in the player data. Sets gamemode, level, health, mana, spawn, current location and inventory. Also shows guild motd and triggers daily rewards.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that selected the character.
        wauzMode - The mode of the character.
        See Also:
        WauzPlayerDataSectionSelections.getSelectedCharacterSlot(), InventoryStringConverter.loadInventory(Player), equipCharacterItems(Player)

      • logoutCharacter

        public static void logoutCharacter(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Logs out the current chracter of the player. Resets gamemode, pet, group, potions, character selection, level, health, mana, saturation, inventory, spawn, location.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is logging out their character.
        See Also:
        saveCharacter(Player), equipHubItems(Player)

      • saveCharacter

        public static void saveCharacter(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Saves the character specified in the player data.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that selected the character.
        See Also:
        InventoryStringConverter.saveInventory(Player), PlayerConfigurator.setCharacterLocation(Player, Location)

      • createCharacter

        public static void createCharacter(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                   WauzMode wauzMode)
        Creates and logs in the new character specified in the player data. Sets player data file content, gamemode, level, health, mana, saturation, start-equip and quest. Also triggers first daily reward.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that selected the new character.
        wauzMode - The mode of the new character.

      • persistCharacterFile

        private static void persistCharacterFile(java.io.File playerDataFile,
                                         org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration playerDataConfig)
        Saves a newly created character config to a file.
        Parameters:
        playerDataFile - The file the config should be saved in.
        playerDataConfig - The config to save.

      • deleteCharacter

        public static void deleteCharacter(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                   java.lang.String characterSlot)
        Deletes the given character permanently.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who owns the character.
        characterSlot - The slot of the character.

      • equipHubItems

        public static void equipHubItems(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Equips a player with default hub items. Currently only the mode selection menu.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should receive the items.
        See Also:
        MenuUtils.setMainMenuOpener(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory, int)

      • equipCharacterItems

        public static void equipCharacterItems(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Equips a player with default mmorpg character items. Contains minimap, quest tracker, main menu and selected tabard. Additionally trashcan, materials and backpack are placed inside the inventory.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should receive the items.
        See Also:
        MenuUtils.setMainMenuOpener(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory, int), TabardMenu.equipSelectedTabard(Player)
